property.name: transitionDocumentChangeScript
property.value:
<import resource="classpath:/alfresco/templates/webscripts/ru/it/lecm/workflow/review/form/review-ts.form.lib.js">

var document = stm_document;
var currentUser = orgstructure.getCurrentEmployee();
if (document && currentUser) {
  var annulReason = document.properties["lecm-resolutions:annul-signal-reason"];

  lecmPermission.pushAuthentication();
  lecmPermission.setRunAsUserSystem();
  var childErrands = document.sourceAssocs["lecm-errands:additional-document-assoc"];
  if (childErrands) {
    childErrands.forEach(function (errand) {
      //alfsed-732 фикс закрытия недоступных контроллеру поручений
      documentMembers.addMemberWithoutCheckPermission(errand, currentUser, "LECM_BASIC_PG_Reader", true);
      errands.sendCancelSignal(errand.nodeRef.toString(), annulReason, currentUser.nodeRef.toString());
    });
  }

  var baseDocAssoc = document.assocs["lecm-resolutions:base-document-assoc"];
  if (baseDocAssoc && baseDocAssoc.length) {
    edsDocument.sendChildChangeSignal(baseDocAssoc[0]);
  }

  var reviewItemsAssocs = document.assocs["lecm-review-aspects:related-review-records-assoc"];
  if (reviewItemsAssocs && reviewItemsAssocs.length) {
    cancelReviewFromInitiatingDocument(document, reviewItemsAssocs);
  }
  lecmPermission.popAuthentication();

  if (annulReason) {
    var recipients = [];
    var authorAssoc = document.assocs["lecm-resolutions:author-assoc"];
    if (authorAssoc && authorAssoc.length) {
      recipients.push(authorAssoc[0]);
    }
    var creatorAssoc = document.assocs["lecm-document:author-assoc"];
    if (creatorAssoc && creatorAssoc.length) {
      recipients.push(creatorAssoc[0]);
    }

    var controllerAssoc = document.assocs["lecm-resolutions:controller-assoc"];
    if (controllerAssoc && controllerAssoc.length) {
      recipients.push(controllerAssoc[0]);
    }
    notifications.sendNotificationFromCurrentUser({
      recipients: recipients,
      templateCode: 'RESOLUTION_ANNUL',
      templateConfig: {
        mainObject: document,
        eventExecutor: orgstructure.getCurrentEmployee(),
        reason: annulReason
      },
      dontCheckAccessToObject: true
    });
  }
}

property.name: transitionDocumentChangeScript
property.value:
<import resource="classpath:/alfresco/module/resolutions-repo/workflow/scripts/resolution-scripts-lib.js">

(function(){
  var document = bpm_package.children[0];
  if (document) {
    lecmPermission.pushAuthentication();
    lecmPermission.setRunAsUserSystem();
	LECMResolutionActions.processChangeChildSignal(document);
    edsDocument.resetChildChangeSignal(document);
    lecmPermission.popAuthentication();
  }
})();

property.name: transitionDocumentChangeScript
property.value:
<import resource="classpath:/alfresco/module/resolutions-repo/workflow/scripts/resolution-scripts-lib.js">

(function(){
  var document = bpm_package.children[0];
  if (document) {
    lecmPermission.pushAuthentication();
    lecmPermission.setRunAsUserSystem();
	LECMResolutionActions.processChangeChildSignal(document);
    review.resetRelatedReviewChangeCount(document);
    lecmPermission.popAuthentication();
  }
})();

property.name: transitionDocumentChangeScript
property.value:
<import resource="classpath:/alfresco/templates/webscripts/ru/it/lecm/workflow/review/form/review-ts.form.lib.js">

var document = stm_document;
if (document) {
  var signalSender = null;
  var signalSenderAssoc = document.assocs["lecm-eds-aspect:completion-signal-sender-assoc"];
  if (signalSenderAssoc && signalSenderAssoc.length) {
    signalSender = signalSenderAssoc[0];
  }
  var signalReason = document.properties["lecm-eds-aspect:completion-signal-reason"];

  var childErrands = document.sourceAssocs["lecm-errands:additional-document-assoc"];
  if (childErrands) {
    childErrands.forEach(function (errand) {
      //alfsed-732 фикс закрытия недоступных контроллеру поручений
      documentMembers.addMemberWithoutCheckPermission(errand, signalSender, "LECM_BASIC_PG_Reader", true);
      edsDocument.sendCompletionSignal(errand, signalReason, signalSender);
    });
  }

  var reviewItemsAssocs = document.assocs["lecm-review-aspects:related-review-records-assoc"];
  if (reviewItemsAssocs && reviewItemsAssocs.length) {
    reviewItemsAssocs = reviewItemsAssocs.filter(function(item){
      return item.properties['lecm-review-ts:review-state'] == 'NOT_REVIEWED';
    });
    cancelReviewFromInitiatingDocument(document, reviewItemsAssocs);
  }

  var recipients = [];
  var authorAssoc = document.assocs["lecm-resolutions:author-assoc"];
  if (authorAssoc && authorAssoc.length) {
    recipients.push(authorAssoc[0]);
  }
  var creatorAssoc = document.assocs["lecm-document:author-assoc"];
  if (creatorAssoc && creatorAssoc.length) {
    recipients.push(creatorAssoc[0]);
  }

  var controllerAssoc = document.assocs["lecm-resolutions:controller-assoc"];
  if (controllerAssoc && controllerAssoc.length) {
    recipients.push(controllerAssoc[0]);
  }
  notifications.sendNotificationFromCurrentUser({
    recipients: recipients,
    templateCode: 'RESOLUTION_COMPLETION',
    templateConfig: {
      mainObject: document,
      reason: signalReason
    },
    dontCheckAccessToObject: true
  });

  var logText = "Исполнение резолюции #mainobject ";
  logText += documentScript.wrapperTitle("завершено", signalReason ? signalReason : "");
  businessJournal.log(document.nodeRef.toString(), "EXECUTE_DOCUMENT", logText, []);

  edsDocument.resetCompletionSignal(document);
}

property.name: actionScript
actionScript
actionScript
actionScript
property.value:
<import resource="classpath:/alfresco/templates/webscripts/ru/it/lecm/workflow/review/form/review-ts.form.lib.js">

var document = stm_document;
if (document) {
  var baseDocumentAssoc = document.assocs["lecm-resolutions:base-document-assoc"];
  if (baseDocumentAssoc && baseDocumentAssoc.length) {
    sendDocumentToReview(baseDocumentAssoc[0], document.assocs["lecm-resolutions:reviewers-assoc"], document);
  }
}
